name: Fake News (Rasmus)
description:
A party game where 3-6 players try to make the best news article.

Made for a university project where you have to make your own business, otherwise I would be giving this game away.  It was made in a day due to deadline constraints and is "functional". However everybody I playtested with got a few laughs and honestly I can't ask for more than that. When I have time I may come back and make the thing look and sound pretty.

Any bugs you find or want to show me a particularly funny article you made or just enjoyed the game. Feel free to leave a comment, tweet at me @RasmusMakesGame or email me at rasmusmakesgames@gmail.com. 

Hope you enjoy!
